commitResults.messageTitle: Level 1: Add echo functionality and bye command
commitResults.messageBody:
- Implement command echoing for user inputs
- Add bye command to gracefully exit the application
- Improve CLI output formatting with proper borders
- Fix scanner resource management in CliReader
- Update greeting message formatting

commitResults.messageTitle: Level 2: Add task storage and list functionality
commitResults.messageBody:
- Implement TaskManager with fixed-size array for up to 100 tasks
- Add AddedTaskMessage to confirm task addition
- Add TaskListMessage to display numbered task list
- Update Winnie to handle 'list' command and store user input
- Remove unused Interaction classes to simplify architecture
- Fix typo in GreetingMessage formatting

Tasks are stored in memory without disk persistence as required.
User can add tasks by typing any text and view them with 'list'.

commitResults.messageTitle: A-Class: add Task class to represent the tasks

commitResults.messageBody:
- Create Task class with isDone status and status icon methods
- Add MarkTaskMessage and UnmarkTaskMessage for user feedback
- Implement mark/unmark commands in Winnie with error handling
- Update TaskManager to support marking and unmarking tasks
- Enhance TaskListMessage to show task status with [X] and [ ]
- Update AddedTaskMessage to work with Task objects

Users can now mark tasks as done with 'mark N' and unmark with
'unmark N' commands. Invalid task numbers are handled gracefully.

commitResults.messageTitle: Level 4: Add inheritance with Todo, Deadline, Event
commitResults.messageBody:
- Convert Task to abstract class with protected fields
- Create Todo, Deadline, Event classes inheriting from Task
- Implement polymorphism with Task[] array storage
- Add type icons [T], [D], [E] for different task types
- Add TaskAddedMessage with task count feedback
- Update command parsing for todo, deadline, event commands
- Support deadline syntax: 'deadline X /by Y'
- Support event syntax: 'event X /from Y /to Z'

All task types now stored polymorphically in TaskManager using
inheritance. Each type displays appropriate formatting and icons.

commitResults.messageTitle: Level 5: Add comprehensive error handling with exceptions
commitResults.messageBody:
- Create WinnieException as base exception class for all chatbot errors
- Implement specific exception types:
  - EmptyDescriptionException for empty task descriptions
  - InvalidTaskNumberException for invalid task numbers
  - UnknownCommandException for unrecognized commands
  - MissingTimeException for missing time parameters
- Add ErrorMessage class for consistent error output formatting
- Update command parsing with comprehensive error validation
- Add try-catch blocks in main loop for graceful error handling
- Remove ToSendMessage class and refactor GreetingMessage
- Improve user feedback with specific error messages and usage hints

All errors now properly handled with custom exceptions and clear
user-friendly error messages that guide users to correct usage.

commitResults.messageTitle: Level 6: Add delete functionality with Java Collections
commitResults.messageBody:
- Replace fixed-size array with ArrayList<Task> in TaskManager
- Implement deleteTask method with dynamic sizing capabilities
- Add DeleteTaskMessage class for deletion confirmation feedback
- Add delete command parsing in Winnie with proper error handling
- Update all TaskManager methods to use ArrayList operations
- Add comprehensive error handling for delete command validation
- Support 'delete N' syntax to remove tasks by number

Tasks now stored in ArrayList providing dynamic sizing, easier
add/delete operations, and improved memory efficiency. Users can
delete tasks with 'delete 3' and get confirmation with task count.

- Add comprehensive text UI testing using I/O redirection technique
- Create EXPECTED.TXT with expected outputs for all commands
- Test coverage includes:
  * ASCII art greeting display
  * Task creation (todo, deadline, event)
  * Task listing with proper formatting
  * Mark/unmark functionality with status display
  * Delete functionality with confirmation messages
  * Error handling for invalid inputs and edge cases
  * Proper task numbering after deletions
  * Graceful exit with bye command
- Enables semi-automated testing to reduce manual testing effort
- Covers typical user commands and error scenarios

commitResults.messageTitle: A-Enums: Refactor with enum-based command and task type system
commitResults.messageBody:
- Create Command enum for all chatbot commands (BYE, LIST, MARK, etc.)
- Implement TaskType enum for task type management (TODO, DEADLINE, EVENT)
- Add CommandDispatcher class to handle command parsing and validation
- Refactor Task hierarchy to use TaskType enum instead of abstract methods
- Replace hardcoded string comparisons with enum-based switch statements
- Centralize command recognition logic with Command.fromString() method
- Improve type safety and code maintainability with enum constants
- Separate input command handling from main file
- Add parameter validation methods to Command enum

Benefits: Type-safe command handling, centralized command parsing,
easier to extend with new commands, reduced string literal usage,
and improved code organization with clear separation of concerns.

- Implement Storage class to save/load tasks to/from ./data/duke.txt
- TaskManager automatically saves tasks when task list changes
- Handle cases where data file/directory doesn't exist
- Use OS-independent relative file paths
- Support for saving/loading Todo, Deadline, and Event tasks

commitResults.messageTitle: Add Level-8: Dates and Times functionality
commitResults.messageBody:
- Implement LocalDateTime support for Deadline and Event tasks
- Add DateTimeUtil class for parsing and formatting dates/times
- Support yyyy-mm-dd and yyyy-mm-dd HHmm input formats
- Display dates in MMM dd yyyy format (e.g., Oct 15 2019)
- Add InvalidDateTimeException for better error handling
- Update Storage to handle DateTime serialization/deserialization
- Tasks now store actual date/time objects instead of strings

commitResults.messageTitle: Merge branch-Level-8: Add dates and times functionality
A-MoreOOP: Refactor to improve OOP design
commitResults.messageBody:
- Extract individual Command classes (ByeCommand, DeadlineCommand, etc.)
- Add Parser class to handle command parsing logic
- Add TaskList class to encapsulate task list operations
- Add Ui class to handle user interface interactions
- Replace dispatcher pattern with command pattern for better OOP
- Improve separation of concerns and single responsibility principle
- Rename data file from duke.txt to winnie.txt

commitResults.messageTitle: A-Gradle/Add the support for gradle in winnie

commitResults.messageBody:
- Add ParserTest with 12 test methods covering command parsing
- Add TodoTest with 9 test methods covering task creation and state management
- Add TaskListTest covering task list operations
- Add DateTimeUtilTest covering date/time parsing and formatting
- Tests cover edge cases, error handling, and normal operations
- All tests pass successfully

commitResults.messageTitle: Refactor: Enhance task management system with improved type handling
commitResults.messageBody:
- Replace TaskType with TaskEnum for better type safety and handling
- Refactor TaskList class to provide centralized task management
- Update all command classes to use new TaskList structure:
  * DeadlineCommand, DeleteCommand, EventCommand
  * ListCommand, MarkCommand, TodoCommand, UnmarkCommand
- Enhance Storage class to accommodate new TaskList architecture
- Improve UI and utility classes with better documentation
- Add comprehensive error handling across all components
- Extend TaskListTest with additional JUnit test coverage
- Update Parser to work with new task management system
- Enhance TaskManager integration with refactored components

commitResults.messageTitle: Level-9: Add basic supports for find command
commitResults.messageBody:
-  Update Command Enums to include "find"
- Update Parser
- Create new FoundTasksMessage
- Create new testcases for testing find functionality

commitResults.messageTitle: A-Jar: Add support for building Jar
Squashed commit: Add JavaDoc and various improvements
Add more documentation for message classes
